name: ASC Bio
author: agendasemprecheia(Jailson Pacagnan Santana)

sections.description:
ASC Bio Plugin is a multi-link tool for use in social media to add many link(urls) in a single page from your site.
similar to linktree, but i’ts more:
-> You can associate with your wordpress site!
-> You can add as many links as you like!
-> You can custumize font-color and background-color of links
-> You have a field to add your custom css
-> You can have a custom image in the top of page
-> You have a field to add your Google Analytics code
-> You have a field to add your Facebook Pixel code
-> You can custumize the name of the page, examples: “yoursite.com/links”, “yoursite.com/bio”…
-> I’ts All Free!
sections.installation:
Upload the ASC Bio Plugin to your site, activate it, and then enter your ASC Bio Plugin dashboard in admin panel.
Configure as you want.

1, 2, 3: i’ts done!
sections.faq:
Can i delete a specific button or link?

Yes! you can add or delete any links or buttons that you desire.

Can i restore the default colors of plugin?

Yes! you can restore the default colors that comes with the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

Release Date – 27 May 2020

  • Created the plugin.
  • Tested the plugin.
  • Publish the plugin
